channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Newly sworn-in FBI Director Kash Patel welcomes Dan Bongino as deputy director: 'He’s a cops cop'

item.title: Vatican Thinks ‘Charity’ Means Championing Democrat Causes And Taking Money To Flout Immigration Laws
item.description: The U.S. Conference of Catholic Bishops, in accord with Pope Francis, opposes Trump’s resolve to curtail illegal migration.

item.title: ‘Fair Access’ Bill Would Finally Stop Activist Banks From Discriminating Against Conservatives
item.description: Financial institutions don't have authority to silence political or religious individuals or groups with whom they don’t agree.

item.title: MSNBC May Be Canceling Joy Reid, But Leftists Just Can’t Quit Crazy
item.description: Reid’s exit follows years of cringe-packed rants and reports of ever-declining ratings.

item.title: China’s War for Indo-Pacific Dominance Is Already Underway

item.title: Institutional Resistance To Trump Proves The Left’s Disdain For Democracy
